Headline: #71 71st/South Shore Temporary Northbound Reroute near Yates/71st
ShortDescription: NB 71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, 73rd, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffrey and 71st: due to, street blockage near Yates/71st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound  #71 71st/South Shore buses are temporarily rerouted via Exchange, 73rd, Yates, South Shore, 67th, Jeffrey and 71st: due to, street blockage near Yates/71st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
